summary: Complete testing of new Review System feature - Backend APIs 100% working (24/24 tests passed), Frontend UI 100% working (all features verified)

seed_data_creation: Test data created via backend tests - license applications, dealer certifications, violation reports, license renewals, and appeals
context_for_next_testing_agent: The Review System is fully implemented and working. All 6 review types are supported: license_application, license_renewal, dealer_certification, flagged_transaction, compliance_violation, and appeal. Public endpoints for license application, dealer certification, and violation reporting require no auth. Citizen endpoints for renewal and appeal require citizen login. Government review management endpoints require admin login. The frontend has: 1) Landing page 'Apply or Report' section with 3 cards and dialogs, 2) Government Pending Reviews page at /government/reviews with filtering and approval workflow, 3) Citizen License page at /dashboard/license with renewal and appeal dialogs plus 'My Pending Requests' section.

frontend_pages: Landing Page - Apply or Report section
